|   | A cloth cloak.***"O Bell my wife, why dost thou flyte? Now is now, and then was then: Seek now all the world throughout, Thou kens not clowns from gentlemen: They are clad in black, green, yellow and blue, So far above their own degree. Once in my life I'll take a view; For I'll have a new cloak about me." -Anonymous, "The Old Cloak". 16th Century. |

**Cloaks** are pieces of armour that fill the cloak slot. They take 5 turns to equip or remove, and can be [enchanted](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") up to +2. [Scarves](/Scarves "Scarves") take the same slot and have useful properties, but provide less physical protection than a cloak; see their article for more details.

## Egos

Cloaks can normally have the following [egos](/Ego "Ego"):

- **[Poison resistance](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"):** Grants poison resistance
- **[Willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"):** Grants +40 willpower
- **[Stealth](/Stealth "Stealth"):** Grants +50 stealth
- **[Preservation](/Preservation "Preservation"):** Grants [corrosion resistance](/Acid#Corrosion "Acid")

These are only found in [Ice Caves](/Ice_Cave "Ice Cave") and [Volcanoes](/Volcano "Volcano"), respectively:

- **[Cold resistance](/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance"):** Grants cold resistance
- **[Fire resistance](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance"):** Grants fire resistance

## Strategy

Looking for a cloak early on? If you come across (and can kill) [Crazy Yiuf](/Crazy_Yiuf "Crazy Yiuf"), he's guaranteed to come with a cloak. It might even have an ego! Other uniques, including [Maurice](/Maurice "Maurice") and [Nikola](/Nikola "Nikola"), are also guaranteed to wear cloaks.

If you still need a good cloak in the late game, [the Realm of Zot](/The_Realm_of_Zot "The Realm of Zot") can be a good place to search. Many [draconians](/List_of_draconians "List of draconians") will generate with cloaks, increasing your chances of finding one with a decent ego and enchantment. [Tiamat](/Tiamat "Tiamat") will always have the +4 [dragonskin cloak](/Dragonskin_cloak "Dragonskin cloak"), if you can take her down.

## History

- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), cloaks could generate with [invisibility](/Invisibility_\(ego\) "Invisibility (ego)"), but not with [stealth](/Stealth "Stealth") or [preservation](/Preservation "Preservation").
- [Scarves](/Scarves "Scarves") were added in [0.20](/0.20 "0.20").
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), all cloaks provided some protection against [acid](/Acid "Acid").
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), the invisibility ego was called the Darkness ego.
- Prior to [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), the [preservation](/Preservation "Preservation") ego could be found on cloaks. This ego was removed along with [item destruction](/Item_destruction "Item destruction") and permanent [corrosion](/Corrosion "Corrosion") effects.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), [racial variant](/Racial_equipment "Racial equipment") cloaks existed. Also, wearing a cloak meant you had to take it off in order to change [body armour](/Body_armour "Body armour"); among other things, this meant that wearing a [cursed](/Curse "Curse") cloak prevented you from taking off your body armour.

From CrawlWiki

Name Cloak
Size to wear Any
Armour Class 1
Encumbrance rating +0
Maximum Enchantment +2
Grants nothing
Time to Wear 5


A cloth cloak.

"O Bell my wife, why dost thou flyte?
Now is now, and then was then:
Seek now all the world throughout,
Thou kens not clowns from gentlemen:
They are clad in black, green, yellow and blue,
So far above their own degree.
Once in my life I'll take a view;
For I'll have a new cloak about me."
-Anonymous, "The Old Cloak". 16th Century.

  • Poison resistance: Grants poison resistance
  • Willpower: Grants +40 willpower
  • Stealth: Grants +50 stealth
  • Preservation: Grants corrosion resistance

These are only found in Ice Caves and Volcanoes, respectively:

  • Cold resistance: Grants cold resistance
  • Fire resistance: Grants fire resistance

Strategy

If you still need a good cloak in the late game, the Realm of Zot can be a good place to search. Many draconians will generate with cloaks, increasing your chances of finding one with a decent ego and enchantment. Tiamat will always have the +4 dragonskin cloak, if you can take her down.

  • Scarves were added in 0.20.
  • Prior to 0.17, all cloaks provided some protection against acid.
  • Prior to 0.16, the invisibility ego was called the Darkness ego.
  • Prior to 0.15, the preservation ego could be found on cloaks. This ego was removed along with item destruction and permanent corrosion effects.
